BGA Sales Goes Live!
On November 19th, BGA Sales was successfully migrated to the Aero instance of Salesforce.com for consolidation of SFDC licenses into a single Aerospace CRM environment. 

 

The existing groups will benefit by having all of Sales in the same instance to streamline processes (e.g.  Leads, Lead to Opportunity conversionâ€¦), improve master data maintenance, and provide the capability to deliver Aerospace level sales roll up data across ATR, BGA and D&S.
